text: Dallas Tornado was a soccer club which played in North American Soccer League. ==League position== Season League Position 1968 NASL 4th / Gulf 1969 NASL 3rd 1970 NASL 3rd / South 1971 NASL Champions 1972 NASL Semifinal 1973 NASL Final 1974 NASL Semifinal 1975 NASL 4th / Center 1976 NASL Quarterfinal 1977 NASL Quarterfinal 1978 NASL 3rd / NATIONAL Center 1979 NASL Playoff First round 1980 NASL Quarterfinal 1981 NASL 4th / Center ==References== Category:Sports in Dallas Category:1967 establishments in Texas Category:1981 disestablishments in the United States Category:Defunct American soccer teams
title: Dallas Tornado
